snippet: The new laws include restrictions on ammunition magazines, weapons and includes background checks for all firearm sales in the state.
abstract: Gov Dannel P Malloy of Connecticut, alongside family members of some of the victims of the Newtown massacre, signs into law sweeping new restrictions on weapons and ammunition magazines, giving state some of toughest gun laws in the country.
lead_paragraph: The new laws include restrictions on ammunition magazines, weapons and includes background checks for all firearm sales in the state.

headline.seo: Malloy Signs Connecticut Gun Measures Into Law
headline.print_headline:
Gun Limits
Are Signed
Into Law
By Malloy
